description: Interact with Linear project management through AI assistants. Access and manage your Linear projects, issues, and teams seamlessly with AI-driven commands. Enhance your productivity by automating project management tasks effortlessly.

token.description: Your Linear API key. Required for Linear API access.

tools.name: linear_getViewer
tools.description: Get information about the currently authenticated user

tools.name: linear_getOrganization
tools.description: Get information about the current Linear organization

tools.name: linear_getUsers
tools.description: Get a list of users in the Linear organization

tools.name: linear_getLabels
tools.description: Get a list of issue labels from Linear

tools.name: linear_getTeams
tools.description: Get a list of teams from Linear

tools.name: linear_getWorkflowStates
tools.description: Get workflow states for a team

teamId.description: ID of the team to get workflow states for

includeArchived.description: Whether to include archived states (default: false)

tools.name: linear_getProjects
tools.description: Get a list of projects from Linear

tools.name: linear_createProject
tools.description: Create a new project in Linear

teamIds.description: IDs of the teams this project belongs to

tools.name: linear_updateProject
tools.description: Update an existing project in Linear

id.description: ID of the project to update

content.description: New content of the project (Markdown supported)

description.description: New short summary of the project

tools.name: linear_addIssueToProject
tools.description: Add an existing issue to a project

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to add to the project

projectId.description: ID of the project to add the issue to

tools.name: linear_getProjectIssues
tools.description: Get all issues associated with a project

limit.description: Maximum number of issues to return (default: 25)

projectId.description: ID of the project to get issues for

tools.name: linear_getCycles
tools.description: Get a list of all cycles

limit.description: Maximum number of cycles to return (default: 25)

teamId.description: ID of the team to get cycles for (optional)

tools.name: linear_getActiveCycle
tools.description: Get the currently active cycle for a team

teamId.description: ID of the team to get the active cycle for

tools.name: linear_addIssueToCycle
tools.description: Add an issue to a cycle

cycleId.description: ID of the cycle to add the issue to

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to add to the cycle

tools.name: linear_getInitiatives
tools.description: Get a list of all initiatives from Linear

limit.description: Maximum number of initiatives to return

includeArchived.description: Include archived initiatives in the results

tools.name: linear_getInitiativeById
tools.description: Get details of a specific initiative by ID

initiativeId.description: The ID of the initiative to retrieve

includeProjects.description: Include associated projects in the response

tools.name: linear_createInitiative
tools.description: Create a new initiative

color.description: Color of the initiative in hex format

ownerId.description: ID of the user who owns the initiative

tools.name: linear_updateInitiative
tools.description: Update an existing initiative

initiativeId.description: The ID of the initiative to update

tools.name: linear_archiveInitiative
tools.description: Archive an initiative

initiativeId.description: The ID of the initiative to archive

tools.name: linear_unarchiveInitiative
tools.description: Unarchive an initiative

initiativeId.description: The ID of the initiative to unarchive

tools.name: linear_deleteInitiative
tools.description: Delete an initiative (move to trash)

initiativeId.description: The ID of the initiative to delete

tools.name: linear_getInitiativeProjects
tools.description: Get all projects associated with an initiative

includeArchived.description: Include archived projects in the results

tools.name: linear_addProjectToInitiative
tools.description: Add a project to an initiative

projectId.description: The ID of the project to add

tools.name: linear_removeProjectFromInitiative
tools.description: Remove a project from an initiative

projectId.description: The ID of the project to remove

tools.name: linear_getIssues
tools.description: Get a list of recent issues from Linear

limit.description: Maximum number of issues to return (default: 10)

tools.name: linear_getIssueById
tools.description: Get a specific issue by ID or identifier (e.g., ABC-123)

id.description: The ID or identifier of the issue (e.g., ABC-123)

tools.name: linear_searchIssues
tools.description: Search for issues with various filters

limit.description: Maximum number of issues to return (default: 10)

query.description: Text to search for in issue title or description

states.description: Filter issues by state name (e.g., 'Todo', 'In Progress', 'Done')

tools.name: linear_createIssue
tools.description: Create a new issue in Linear

teamId.description: ID of the team the issue belongs to

cycleId.description: ID of the cycle to add the issue to

dueDate.description: The date at which the issue is due (YYYY-MM-DD format)

stateId.description: ID of the workflow state for the issue

estimate.description: The estimated complexity/points for the issue

labelIds.description: IDs of the labels to attach to the issue

parentId.description: ID of the parent issue (to create as a sub-task)

priority.description: Priority of the issue (0 = No priority, 1 = Urgent, 2 = High, 3 = Normal, 4 = Low)

projectId.description: ID of the project the issue belongs to

sortOrder.description: The position of the issue in relation to other issues

assigneeId.description: ID of the user to assign the issue to

templateId.description: ID of a template to use for creating the issue

subscriberIds.description: IDs of the users to subscribe to the issue

tools.name: linear_updateIssue
tools.description: Update an existing issue in Linear

id.description: ID or identifier of the issue to update (e.g., ABC-123)

teamId.description: ID of the team to move the issue to

cycleId.description: ID of the cycle to move the issue to, or null to remove from current cycle

dueDate.description: The new due date for the issue (YYYY-MM-DD format), or null to remove

stateId.description: ID of the new state for the issue

estimate.description: The estimated complexity/points for the issue

labelIds.description: IDs of the labels to set on the issue (replacing existing labels)

parentId.description: ID of the parent issue, or null to convert to a regular issue

priority.description: New priority for the issue (0 = No priority, 1 = Urgent, 2 = High, 3 = Normal, 4 = Low)

projectId.description: ID of the project to move the issue to

sortOrder.description: The position of the issue in relation to other issues

assigneeId.description: ID of the user to assign the issue to, or null to unassign

description.description: New description for the issue (Markdown supported)

addedLabelIds.description: IDs of labels to add to the issue (without removing existing ones)

subscriberIds.description: IDs of the users to subscribe to the issue (replacing existing subscribers)

removedLabelIds.description: IDs of labels to remove from the issue

tools.name: linear_createComment
tools.description: Add a comment to an issue in Linear (supports threaded replies)

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to comment on (e.g., ABC-123)

parentId.description: ID of the parent comment to reply to (for threaded comments)

tools.name: linear_addIssueLabel
tools.description: Add a label to an issue in Linear

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to add the label to (e.g., ABC-123)

labelId.description: ID of the label to add to the issue

tools.name: linear_removeIssueLabel
tools.description: Remove a label from an issue in Linear

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to remove the label from (e.g., ABC-123)

labelId.description: ID of the label to remove from the issue

tools.name: linear_assignIssue
tools.description: Assign an issue to a user

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to assign (e.g., ABC-123)

assigneeId.description: ID of the user to assign the issue to, or null to unassign

tools.name: linear_subscribeToIssue
tools.description: Subscribe to issue updates

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to subscribe to (e.g., ABC-123)

tools.name: linear_convertIssueToSubtask
tools.description: Convert an issue to a subtask

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to convert (e.g., ABC-123)

parentIssueId.description: ID or identifier of the parent issue (e.g., ABC-456)

tools.name: linear_createIssueRelation
tools.description: Create relations between issues (blocks, is blocked by, etc.)

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the first issue (e.g., ABC-123)

relatedIssueId.description: ID or identifier of the second issue (e.g., ABC-456)

tools.name: linear_archiveIssue
tools.description: Archive an issue

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to archive (e.g., ABC-123)

tools.name: linear_setIssuePriority
tools.description: Set the priority of an issue

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue (e.g., ABC-123)

priority.description: Priority level (0 = No priority, 1 = Urgent, 2 = High, 3 = Normal, 4 = Low)

tools.name: linear_transferIssue
tools.description: Transfer an issue to another team

teamId.description: ID of the team to transfer the issue to

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to transfer (e.g., ABC-123)

tools.name: linear_duplicateIssue
tools.description: Duplicate an issue

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to duplicate (e.g., ABC-123)

tools.name: linear_getIssueHistory
tools.description: Get the history of changes made to an issue

limit.description: Maximum number of history events to return (default: 10)

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue (e.g., ABC-123)

tools.name: linear_getComments
tools.description: Get all comments for an issue

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to return (default: 25)

issueId.description: ID or identifier of the issue to get comments from (e.g., ABC-123)
